name: Sabotage (itch) (B1nary_B0b)
description:
This is meant as a local multiplayer game where one player tries to go as far as possible, whilst the other tries to sabotage their efforts by placing obstacles in their way. The game is not complete as there were several important features that eventually got cut out. Have fun!

Controls:

Player1 Jump: Spacebar/W 

Player2 Abilities: Left Mouse Button
